turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'm on my way home. And I want to get a a drink ordered from Starbucks so I could pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a grounded coffee latte with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: location on Spruce Street in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a grande caffe latte with 2% milk to be picked up at the starbucks on spruce street. is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: K. That's it. Thank you so much.
